name: Run for Money Tousouchuu
summary: Inspired by the best selling TV program Escaping, the game gives everyone a chance to taste the speed and the thrill of running away from hunters. Spot your captor and run. There are ten stages, and all of them are filled to the brim with danger. Trick the hunters, give them false traces and slip from their clutches until time runs out. If you clear the game, you'll win a fortune.
